channel.title: Shortbow special attack?
channel.description: Okay so as you can see below in the pic my magic short bow spec, the arrows hit at the same time its the same thing with my dark bow... how can I make it to where the arrows are a bit delayed so one hits then the other>? Please help I can't find this anywhere..
